products.name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
products.description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is a flagship smartphone known for its exceptional camera quality, featuring the latest Google Tensor chip and a stunning OLED display.

products.name: Google Pixelbook Pro
products.description: The Google Pixelbook Pro is a high-end Chromebook offering a sleek design, a powerful processor, and a brilliant 13.3-inch 4K display.

products.name: Google Nest Hub
products.description: The Google Nest Hub is a smart display with Google Assistant, perfect for controlling smart home devices, viewing photos, and watching videos.

products.name: Google Nest Audio
products.description: The Google Nest Audio is a smart speaker that delivers rich, clear audio with Google Assistant integration for voice control and music streaming.

products.description: The Google Pixel C is an older Android tablet known for its premium build quality and high-resolution display.
